text: Project X is a 1987 American science fiction comedy movie directed by Jonathan Kaplan. It stars Matthew Broderick, Helen Hunt, William Sadler, Stephen Lang, Jean Smart, Robin Gammell, Jonathan Stark, Dick Miller, Jules Sylvester, Richard Cummings Jr. and Ken Lerner. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1987 science fiction movies Category:1987 comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Kaplan Category:Movies about apes Category:Movies about animal rights Category:Movies about the United States Air Force Category:Movies set in Wisconsin Category:Movies set in Florida
title: Project X (movie)
